about_the_game:
Welcome to Lake Erde, we hope you enjoy your stay...

This lake was was seen as the future of a properous town and lake-side resort, after a construction crew were sent to get the location settled, they were heard from only once more... when the police were called. Now you must wander through this small forest to piece together what happened and uncover what happened to those that dissappeared here.

Equipped with nothing more than a flare gun, search the abandoned remains of this resort, locate the audio logs of the crew that was left to die. Then return to your vehicle. Be careful though, this lake may not be as abandoned as you think it is.

Goal
    [Wander the forest and discover the left-over remains from what the crew started][Locate the phones of the victim, containing the only know audio logs of what happened here, and the fates of those sent to this forest][Entrusted only with your flare gun you must wander this forest...alone?][Can you find the audio logs and still escape with your life?]

Features
    [Locate the audio logs that have been scattered around the lake, to find out what happened here][Flee from the entities that aim to stop you from escaping][Can you make it out alive?]

Welcome to Lake Erde, we hope you enjoy your stay...

This lake was was seen as the future of a properous town and lake-side resort, after a construction crew were sent to get the location settled, they were heard from only once more... when the police were called. Now you must wander through this small forest to piece together what happened and uncover what happened to those that dissappeared here.

Equipped with nothing more than a flare gun, search the abandoned remains of this resort, locate the audio logs of the crew that was left to die. Then return to your vehicle. Be careful though, this lake may not be as abandoned as you think it is.

name: Nature

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1400 or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070 / AMD Radeon Vega 56 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or OpenXR. Standing or Room Scale

short_description: Lake Erde was once home to an old homestead, now a failed lake-side resort. Search the remains of this worksite to find out what happened to those building the once promising lake-side resort.
